message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1350000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. To further explore the possibility of reaching an agreement, we propose to reconsider our initial offer at $1275000. This price reflects the value we place on maintaining a relationship with a discerning client like yourself. We hope this proposal meets your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to revisit the offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1225000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. We've carefully considered your latest offer and are proposing a price of $1260000. This amount reflects a balance between respecting your budget and ensuring a fair return for us. We believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution. We look forward to your response.
I appreciate your continued effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. I'm willing to meet you at $1220000. This is my best and final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to offer our product at $1240000. This price takes into account both your budgetary constraints and the value we believe the product holds for you. We hope this proposal will be acceptable and allows us to move forward with a successful transaction.
I appreciate your continued effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. I'm willing to meet you at $1215000. This is my best and final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. After thorough consideration, we are willing to offer our product at $1230000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both our interests and your budgetary constraints. We hope this proposal will facilitate a successful conclusion to our negotiations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
